alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BAY COUNTY THROUGH 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/... At 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Callaway, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Nixon, St Andrews State Park, Allanton, Magnolia Beach, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, Bay Harbor, College Station, Bayou George, Cairo, Brannonville, and Millville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
